Pixel2Mesh

  1. Add the following to your github repository's _config.yml
remote_theme: rundocs/jekyll-rtd-theme
  1. Remove any other theme or remote_theme entry

Quick start with remote theme method

This is recommended because bug fixes are the most timely

The new repository will generate with the same files and folders from rundocs/starter-slim, You can preview the theme to see what it looks like, or even generate it today.
